name: Legion of Super Heroes: Brainiac 5 Online Trivia | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Querl Dox.

	Matt Czuchry is an actor who voiced the role of Brainiac 5 on the animated series 'Justice League Unlimited'.  Jess Rath is an actor who plays the role of Brainiac 5 on the WB series, 'Supergirl'.  Noel Fisher is an actor who voiced the role of Brainiac 5 in the animated film, 'Justice League vs. the Fatal Five'.

Colu.

	Other notable Coluans include Brainiac, Vril Dox, Lyrl Dox and Z'ndr Kol. The planet has issues revolving around over population.

questions.text: For many of the early years of the Legion, Brainiac 5 harbored a crush on a fellow Legion member.  Which one?
questions.explanation:
Supergirl.

	Brainy (as Legion members referred to him) carried a crush on Supergirl for many years, and declared that love on several occasions... even asking her once if she would stay in the future to be with him.

questions.text: What power does Brainiac 5 provide the Legion?
options: His ability to interface with computers
His ability to overtake other's brains
questions.explanation:
His 12th level intelligence.

	Coluans typically have a 10th level intelligence, which is much more advanced than the intelligence level of Earthlings, which is 6th level.  Dox is considered the smartest person in the 30th century universe.

questions.text: Brainiac 5 created many useful items for the Legion.  One particular invention however, he create for himself only, something he utilized often.  What is it?
questions.explanation:
Force Field Belt.

	Brainy's force field belt was incorporate as part of his Legion uniform.  Other important inventions he provided the Legion were their traveling Time Bubbles and their multi-purpose Flight Rings.

questions.text: After a battle with a villain called Pulsar Stargrave, there were events that led to Brainiac 5 going insane.  During this time he did much harm to the Legion, including creating the villainous Omega, which ended up destroying the Legion's headquarters.  Which Legion cast member was finally able to return him to sanity?
questions.explanation:
Saturn Girl.

	Matter-Eater Lad came out of retirement to help end Omega by eating the Miracle Machine, which was used to create Omega.  In turn, this drove him insane as well.  Saturn Girl was able enter Brainiac 5's mind and assist him back to sanity by recreating his childhood.

questions.text: During the "Five Year Later" continuity, Brainiac 5 eventually bestowed a force field belt to a second Legionnaire.  Which one?
questions.explanation:
Duo Damsel.

	After battling the Time Trapper ('Legion of Super Heroes' vol 3 - circa 1988), Duo Damsel loses a second of her (originally 3) bodies.  After this happens, Brainiac 5 issues her remaining body a force field belt.

questions.text: In the post 'Zero Hour' reboot, prior to being drafted into the Legion, Brainiac 5 worked for a while at the Time Institute on Talus.  What longtime Legion associate does he work with?
questions.explanation:
Rond Vidar.

	Rond Vidar has a long history with the Legion.  He is the son of their enemy Universo.  In original continuity he was given Legion Reservist status.  He later becomes a Green Lantern and eventually a member of the Legion of Super Heroes.

questions.text: In the post Zero Hour reboot period, Brainy is part of a team that encounters a space anomaly.  After this encounter he finds he has been upgraded, and he begins to be called Brainiac 5.1.  What is the most noticeable improvement?
questions.correct: He now has great people skills
options: He is telepathically linked to Computo
questions.explanation:
He now has great people skills.

	His teammates are delighted not only with the improved social interaction but also with his consideration for others.  Physically, Querl is upgraded as well as he now has several round disks on his forehead and square circuitry pieces on his cheeks.

questions.text: In the continuity referred to as "threeboot" (2004), Brainiac 5 spends much of the series sharing his mind with the consciousness of another fellow Legionnaire who had died in battle.  Which Legionnaire is it?
questions.explanation:
Dream Girl.

	In this continuity, Dream Girl died in battle.  In an attempt to revive her, her physical body is destroyed, but her consciousness is transferred to Brainiac 5.  He can communicate with her whenever he sleeps.
